input.sentences: fund raising event to support helpless animals .
some of our fundraisers decided to dress in costumes for the event .
band members performed several songs for the crowd .
our drummer had some good skills playing the drums .
and our guitarist did an awesome job getting us all entertained .
output.sentences: Derek was a Furry in an 80's Synth Pop band called The Lone Wolves.
The Lone Wolves Played at many concerts and conventions, some with cosplayers and other furries.
Sometimes Derek and the band would play at variety shows with other bands and differeing music generes.
Their most recent collaboration show "Virgins and Volpines" includes a game music coverband "The Joy Sticks"
You can see them This Thursday at the Mountain Dew Ampitheatre, tickets are $20 but they are free for ayone with a Pokemon Tattoo.
